meanings.definition: A high-quality or superior product, especially in the context of luxury goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The store only sells superpremiums like designer handbags and luxury watches.
meanings.sent2: She saved up to buy the superpremiums she had been eyeing for months.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the expensive cat food was superpremiums fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: Her taste buds danced with joy as she savored the superpremiums chocolate.
meanings.sent5: The superpremiums hotel room made her feel like a celebrity.

meanings.definition: An extra payment or fee for a premium service or product.
meanings.sent1: The airline charged superpremiums for the first-class upgrade.
meanings.sent2: He was willing to pay the superpremiums for faster shipping.
meanings.sent3: The superpremiums for the VIP ticket included a meet-and-greet with the band.
meanings.sent4: The superpremiums for the exclusive event were worth every penny.
meanings.sent5: She grumbled about the superpremiums she had to pay for the express service.

meanings.definition: To promote or advertise something as being of superior quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to superpremiums their new line of skincare products.
meanings.sent2: She always knew how to superpremiums her artwork to attract buyers.
meanings.sent3: He tried to superpremiums his homemade cookies as gourmet treats.
meanings.sent4: The marketing team worked hard to superpremiums the brand as a luxury choice.
meanings.sent5: The chef knew how to superpremiums the daily specials to entice customers.
